author: Ove
content: I would have photographed it, and I don't know why. It's a similar situation when you constantly returns and photographs the same view. Why do we do that? A comforting habit, a sense of belonging, compulsive behaviour...who knows. The strive for the original view, the unique 'as never been seen before' image can be pretty tiresome, sometimes you just have to rest and enjoy the simple view.
